name: 郭政淳
objective: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力，經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
schedule:
Week 1	Introduction
Week 2	Summer Universiade
Week 3	Internet Vocabulary
Week 4	Public Facilities
Week 5	Regimen                   
Week 6	Extracurricular Activities 
Week 7	Charity Work
Week 8	Sunrise/Sunset Industry 
Week 9	Presentation (1) 
Week 10	Viral Videos 
Week 11	Rainbow Flag
Week 12	Folk Prescription
Week 13	Superstitions 
Week 14	Social Media   
Week 15	Self-Employment  
Week 16	Private Education     
Week 17	Work Experience
Week 18	Presentation (2)
scorePolicy:
Group Work: 45%
Quizzes: 30%
Role Play & Presentation: 25%
materials:
1. Handouts.
2. Randall's ESL Cyber Listening Lab
